DOC.brief_summary: This open-label extension study evaluate long-term safety efficacy SC TCZ participant moderate severe RA complete 97-week WA22762 ( NCT01194414 ) 96-week NA25220 ( NCT01232569 ) core study SC intravenous ( IV ) TCZ . Participants receive TCZ 162 milligram ( mg ) SC every week ( QW ) every 2 week ( Q2W ) 96 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Extension Study WA22762 NA25220 Subcutaneous ( SC ) Tocilizumab ( TCZ ) Moderate Severe Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA )
